events.text: Hey Jayson I could replace this toilet with a more watersense model if you'd like?
Well basically your toilet right now uses about 4 gallons per flush. You can already imagine the waste of water it is already.
A way to conserve water per flush is always to just follow the "if its brown flush it down" method. But, I COMPLETELY understand if your against that...
With this new water sense model you'd be using 1.28 gallons per flush... A HUGE difference!
Wow... I never knew the amount of water I was wasting per flush. I dont know about the whole "if its brown flush it down" but I will definitely take the new model!
